issue.title: androidauthority.com
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version 3.6 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.androidauthority.com/mobile/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The problem is caused by this filter `AdGuard – Ads` - https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt When the specified filter is enabled - all site content is hidden. When the specified filter is disabled - all site content is visible and functional. **Open this exact address**: https://www.androidauthority.com/mobile/ 2. Screenshots Browser name and version: **Chromium v.140.0.7339.100** ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: If you use uBlock Origin Lite, then new rules will be available in one of the next extension updates (the same apply to AdGuard MV3 extension).

issue.title: Remove targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr domain from DNS filter list
issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for iOS ### AdGuard version 4.5.11 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%9A%94%EA%B8%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%B0%EB%8B%A4%EB%A6%BC-%EC%97%86%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%9B%EC%A7%91-%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%95%B1/id543831532 ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` domain use core location api for our business (critical problem). So please remove both `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` and `static-webviews.yogiyo.co.kr` domains from DNS filter list. If you have any question about this issue, please mention to me. 2. Ref issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210863 3. Added filter - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/708dc5ce9ad3ec41afad6db6f759c5020ab1aed0/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers_firstparty.txt#L83 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for iOS ### AdGuard version 4.5.11 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? the problem is with app, not a site ### Which device do you use? Mobile ### Where is the problem encountered? https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%9A%94%EA%B8%B0%EC%9A%94-%EA%B8%B0%EB%8B%A4%EB%A6%BC-%EC%97%86%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%9B%EC%A7%91-%EB%B0%B0%EB%8B%AC%EC%95%B1/id543831532 ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` domain use core location api for our business (critical problem). So please remove both `targetyo.yogiyo.co.kr` and `static-webviews.yogiyo.co.kr` domains from DNS filter list. If you have any question about this issue, please mention to me. 2. Ref issue - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/210863 3. Added filter - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/708dc5ce9ad3ec41afad6db6f759c5020ab1aed0/SpywareFilter/sections/tracking_servers_firstparty.txt#L83 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:

pull_request.title: Bump actions/checkout from 4 to 5
pull_request.body:
Bumps [actions/checkout](https://github.com/actions/checkout) from 4 to 5.
Release notes

Sourced from actions/checkout's releases.

v5.0.0

What's Changed

  • Update actions checkout to use node 24 by @​salmanmkc in actions/checkout#2226
  • Prepare v5.0.0 release by @​salmanmkc in actions/checkout#2238

⚠️ Minimum Compatible Runner Version

v2.327.1
Release Notes

Make sure your runner is updated to this version or newer to use this release.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/actions/checkout/compare/v4...v5.0.0

v4.3.0

What's Changed

  • docs: update README.md by @​motss in actions/checkout#1971
  • Add internal repos for checking out multiple repositories by @​mouismail in actions/checkout#1977
  • Documentation update - add recommended permissions to Readme by @​benwells in actions/checkout#2043
  • Adjust positioning of user email note and permissions heading by @​joshmgross in actions/checkout#2044
  • Update README.md by @​nebuk89 in actions/checkout#2194
  • Update CODEOWNERS for actions by @​TingluoHuang in actions/checkout#2224
  • Update package dependencies by @​salmanmkc in actions/checkout#2236
  • Prepare release v4.3.0 by @​salmanmkc in actions/checkout#2237

New Contributors

  • @​motss made their first contribution in actions/checkout#1971
  • @​mouismail made their first contribution in actions/checkout#1977
  • @​benwells made their first contribution in actions/checkout#2043
  • @​nebuk89 made their first contribution in actions/checkout#2194
  • @​salmanmkc made their first contribution in actions/checkout#2236

Full Changelog: https://github.com/actions/checkout/compare/v4...v4.3.0

v4.2.2

What's Changed

  • url-helper.ts now leverages well-known environment variables by @​jww3 in actions/checkout#1941
  • Expand unit test coverage for isGhes by @​jww3 in actions/checkout#1946

Full Changelog: https://github.com/actions/checkout/compare/v4.2.1...v4.2.2

v4.2.1

What's Changed

  • Check out other refs/* by commit if provided, fall back to ref by @​orhantoy in actions/checkout#1924

New Contributors

  • @​Jcambass made their first contribution in actions/checkout#1919

Full Changelog: https://github.com/actions/checkout/compare/v4.2.0...v4.2.1

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from actions/checkout's changelog.

Changelog

V5.0.0

  • Update actions checkout to use node 24 by @​salmanmkc in actions/checkout#2226

V4.3.0

  • docs: update README.md by @​motss in actions/checkout#1971
  • Add internal repos for checking out multiple repositories by @​mouismail in actions/checkout#1977
  • Documentation update - add recommended permissions to Readme by @​benwells in actions/checkout#2043
  • Adjust positioning of user email note and permissions heading by @​joshmgross in actions/checkout#2044
  • Update README.md by @​nebuk89 in actions/checkout#2194

You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

Other ad blocker ### AdGuard version 3.6 ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? Chrome ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://www.androidauthority.com/mobile/ ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy _No response_ ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances _No response_ ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific _No response_ ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. The problem is caused by this filter `AdGuard – Ads` - https://filters.adtidy.org/extension/ublock/filters/2_without_easylist.txt When the specified filter is enabled - all site content is hidden. issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/203236#issuecomment-3254748434 - Please update filters.

1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/203236#issuecomment-3254612450
>YouTube videos fail to buffer past approximately 1 minute in with AdGuard enabled. Affecting all videos tried.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/203236#issuecomment-3254644710
>Videos en YouTube se detienen de repente mostrando error al reproducir. Detecta bloqueador de anuncios y propone desactivarlos o desinstalarlos.

Should be fixed in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/59350553f1ada71242f0623efaa1ac16b7c05b6f
Please update filters after about 1 hour.

As a temporary solution you can add following rule to user rules:
```adblock
#@%#//scriptlet('prevent-eval-if', 'js_var_adBaitAnimation')
```

4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973
